languages.text: "Они умирали, проклиная тебя — рабыню, что завела их на бойню, и — единственная — спаслась".

traits.locale_text: "Они умирали, проклиная тебя — рабыню, что завела их на бойню, и — единственная — спаслась".
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Speaker

languages.text: "They died cursing your name. The name of the puppet who had brought them to the slaughter and then alone escaped with her life."
languages.original_text: "Они умирали, проклиная тебя — рабыню, что завела их на бойню, и — единственная — спаслась".

traits.locale_text: "They died cursing your name. The name of the puppet who had brought them to the slaughter and then alone escaped with her life."
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Speaker

traits.locale_text: "They died cursing your name. The name of the puppet who had brought them to the slaughter and then alone escaped with her life."
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Speaker

languages.text: 「彼らはあなたの名前を呪いながら死んでいった。彼らを屠殺場へ連れて行き、自分はまんまと生きて脱出した操り人形の名前を」
languages.original_text: "They died cursing your name. The name of the puppet who had brought them to the slaughter and then alone escaped with her life."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らはあなたの名前を呪いながら死んでいった。彼らを屠殺場へ連れて行き、自分はまんまと生きて脱出した操り人形の名前を」
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Speaker

languages.text: “他们死的时候都在诅咒你的名字。就是你这个傀儡将那些人带到了大屠杀之中，之后一个人逃了回去。”
languages.original_text: "They died cursing your name. The name of the puppet who had brought them to the slaughter and then alone escaped with her life."

traits.locale_text: “他们死的时候都在诅咒你的名字。就是你这个傀儡将那些人带到了大屠杀之中，之后一个人逃了回去。”
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Speaker

languages.text: « Ils sont morts en maudissant votre nom. Le nom du pantin qui les a conduits à l'abattoir avant de sauver sa misérable vie. »
languages.original_text: "They died cursing your name. The name of the puppet who had brought them to the slaughter and then alone escaped with her life."

traits.locale_text: « Ils sont morts en maudissant votre nom. Le nom du pantin qui les a conduits à l'abattoir avant de sauver sa misérable vie. »
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Speaker

languages.text: «Murieron maldiciendo tu nombre. El nombre de la marioneta que los trajo al matadero y escapó en solitario con su vida».
languages.original_text: "They died cursing your name. The name of the puppet who had brought them to the slaughter and then alone escaped with her life."

traits.locale_text: «Murieron maldiciendo tu nombre. El nombre de la marioneta que los trajo al matadero y escapó en solitario con su vida».
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Speaker

languages.text: "Als sie starben, verfluchten sie Euren Namen. Den Namen der Marionette, die sie zur Schlachtbank geführt hat und dann als Einzige lebend entkam."
languages.original_text: "They died cursing your name. The name of the puppet who had brought them to the slaughter and then alone escaped with her life."

traits.locale_text: "Als sie starben, verfluchten sie Euren Namen. Den Namen der Marionette, die sie zur Schlachtbank geführt hat und dann als Einzige lebend entkam."
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Speaker

languages.text: "Adına lanetler yağdırarak can verdiler. Onları katliama sürükleyip sonra da canı pahasına kaçan kuklanın adına..."
languages.original_text: "They died cursing your name. The name of the puppet who had brought them to the slaughter and then alone escaped with her life."

traits.locale_text: "Adına lanetler yağdırarak can verdiler. Onları katliama sürükleyip sonra da canı pahasına kaçan kuklanın adına..."
